reviews.review: This Game is great. You must play this. It is by far the best game on steam EVER!!!!!
인생첫명작

La verdad es un gran juego, el primero estuvo genial y este para chuparse los dedos... me encanto la historia y vas descubriendo como realmente se creo GlaDOS... por cierto me encanto la parte que se convirtio en una patata xD

A esa peculiar manera de usar tu arma (marca de la casa) se unen su, también único, sentido del humor y sus ingeniosos puzles, que asímismo son originales ya que además de hacerte pensar también demandan habilidad. Es la versión mejorada de su antecesor, que ya era un juegazo (aunque muy corto de duración).

Es uno de los juegos más entretenidos de la historia y, a pesar de sus años, sigue conservándose como el primer día (acabo de rejugarlo y me ha gustado tanto como la primera vez). Divierte y engancha y nos deja con ganas de más.

¡LO AME!

O melhor jogo de quebra cabeça que já joguei, realmente estimula o raciocínio do jogador com etapas muito bem elaboradas, o jogo é bastante longo de forma e cada fase é diferente da outra, assim é impossível enjoar.

A única recomendação é que se você não gosta de desafios não compre, caso contrário vá em frente e divirta-se.
入手正版的时候已经毕业了，没有基友联机了。。
我想退貨........因為我覺得在1折的時候(46NTD)買portal 2實在太對不起做遊戲的工作人員們了 哈哈，就算原價買我也覺得物超所值,大推!!
gam

Качественная головоломка на движке Source, что может быть лучше? Игра затягивает и, в отличие от иных игр, заставляет иногда серьёзно потупить, ведь иногда не знаешь, ГДЕ НАДО СТАВИТЬ ЭТОТ ЧЕРТОВ ПОРТАЛ!!!!!! Рекомендую.

SO AMAZING!!! If you loved the first one, don't even hesitate to get this one.
Writing is phenoninal, gameplay and puzzles are creative and fun. Loads of replay value as well, with a co op camgaign and challange mode.
Un juego muy bueno que cumplio todas mis expectativas de un buen desenlace para la saga portal

Entertaining puzzles. Does not hold your hand. Has many worthwhile mods. Captivating story.

Low skill ceiling, unless you are willing to speedrun.

9/10 - worth a replay

The atmosphere in this game is magnificent.
Story is deep and rich, new puzzles, new mechanics, new game modes like Co-op, etc.
Also the voice lines of GLaDOS and Wheatley are hilarious.
Portal 2 is the sequel Portal deserved.
Totally recommended!
12/10 Would play again.
The best game series ever!

I have spent the last 3 days playing this game, i loved every minute of it. It was challenging but with a bit of perseverance you will have it in no time. Multiplayer is a laugh with mates. The main story is very good. Glad i picked this up on summer sale.

Easily one of the best, most masterfully created games made recently, aside from a couple continuity anomalies or some holes in the story, the game design, writing, and music are all spectacular. 

Easily 95/100 if not higher, one of the best gaming experiences of the last 10 years, and no chance of disapointment

-Ставь туда портал.
-Ок.
(пока летишь в него)

(падаешь в воду и умираешь.)

Lo bueno del juego es que tiene un contenido muy interesante, bien trabajado, tiene una historia cautivadora desarrollada en un  ambiente futurista, post apocalíptico. Los desafíos de cada nivel son gradualmente complejos. Lo mejor según mi opinión es el paradigma orientado a la multi opcionalidad de portales, que puede generar cada usuario.
Una obra de arte.

Fantastico!!
este es el mejor juego de portal que e jugado sin duda si quieres jugar con un amigo este es el juego indicado

I had heard nothing but good things about this game. I was not disappointed.


The story was interesting and had a good sense of humor (Which was only served by the great voice acting). The gameplay made you think, rather than just shoot things and move along. Not to mention the great visuals which clearly took full advantage of the Source engine's true potential.

To summarize:

Pros:
+Great story
+Great voice acting
+Great gameplay
+Great visuals

Cons:
-Not enough JK Simmons
Интересная игра, заставляет подумать не замысловатыми заданиями, игра которая может почти сравнится с Half-Life

Me surpreendeu muito!

Com momentos desafiadores!

Vale muito apena comprar!
Obs:Antes de comprar eu achava que o jogo ia ficar de infeite na biblioteca,mas dei uma chance e fui jogar.Me incantei pelo jogo e passei o dia inteiro jogando.

Esta segunda entrega realiza varios pasos adelante con respecto al primero. Fallos anteriores (al menos lo fueron para mi, aunque nada grave que manchara el resultado final del juego) como la poca duración o la excesiva sencillez de los puzzles han sido solucionados con creces. Además hay que sumar una mayor variedad, más humor y una historia más completa.
Everything is simply great, the story, the gameplay, the voice acting and every other thing. just PLAY IT.
补票，跟舍友联机通关，贼鸡儿好玩。^_^
geat game

Долго голову ломала, порталы открывала я,
Но вот уж так случилось, на одном уровне застряла я,
Пришла к ютубу, прошу помочь,
А он мне и сказал EROR 404.
Шли дни, недели,и поняла подвох,
Увидела, необычный куб,
Что за странное сердечко на нём было?
Никто и не знаёт, ну да ладно
С ГЛаДОС бегали,скакали.
УитЛи, друг мой,компаньон,
Пришла к финалу, что теперь?Незнаю!
Как вдруг, УитЛи падлец коварный, захотел меня убить!
Но я же просто и не сдамся, бегала ходила, кнопки нажимала,
Разгромила УтЛи ,ГЛаДОС на его место стала!
С миром отпустила, ну и я ушла!
Está muy chido este  juego. Me encantan los pusles, etc
Das Spiel ist so gut das man es nicht in Worte fassen kann. :)
Great Game

Um jogo incrível, cheio de puzzles e personagens marcantes. Amo Portal, e o segundo jogo não pode ficar de fora se você gosta também, se você termina o modo campanha e acha que vai ter que re-jogar.... Se enganou. Além do modo campanha, também tem o modo co-op, onde dois amigáveis robôs poderão ser controlados por jogadores para resolver mais câmaras de testes, você e seu amigo! [strike]Se você não tiver amigos você pode ir com uma pessoa aleatória também.[/strike] E mais! Você também pode criar câmaras de testes e jogá-las! Além de poder compartilhar para outras pessoas e jogar a delas também. A criação de puzzles funciona com co-op.

Eu comprei e não me arrependi, e acho que você pode não se arrepender também.

[spoiler]The cake is a lie.[/spoiler]
fun to play and headache is real
가르기럽 가르기럽 우!

很棒的游戏体验，但是就是单人关卡比较多，玩到六七章就有点疲倦了。卡关的时候非常需要耐心，如果不喜欢解谜或者没有耐心的朋友 可能会玩不下去。有些关卡设计得很巧妙，虽然思考时间长，但是通关后非常有成就感。相比单人的投入、成就感还有一点累，双人模式非常欢乐。和同伴一起思考然后解谜得到的快感是双倍的，而且有意或者无意的坑队友都超级搞笑。对于喜欢这类游戏的朋友来说，真的强烈推荐，玩着玩着就上瘾了，游戏体验超级棒！
This is game is excellence incarnate. Everyone who likes gaming should play this.
Best game on steam.

This game is AMAZING!
I bought this in the Valve bundle on summersale where portal 2 was just 2 euro's.
I thought it would be a fun game to solve puzzle's but I didn't know there was a whole story to it.
The story was a lot of fun! It's a little bit short (about 10 hours) but you still have the coop mode (which I will play soon) and you can create your own levels and play levels from everyone on the whole world.

I strongly recommend this game! Even for full price.
Mucho mejor que el primero, me encanta.

Portal 2 Strokes his story and gameplay. I played the game 2-3 times, but I still miss several missions 2 times. The game is very good with its shoe and interfesom. Multiplayer with another fun to spend, you can play a trick on the other, and it's over you, it's a little more complicated, but still it's mean. 8.9 / 10

Ce jeu est tout simplement génial ! Je trouve même que le deuxième opus de Portal est mieux que le premier par ses shaders améliorés, son scénario étoffé, si bien que j'ai terminé le mode solo deux fois...

Je n'ai jamais vu un jeu aussi chronophage, à vrai dire, les espérences graphiques n'ont pas beaucoup augmenté depuis 2012 et le Workshop est rempli de salles de test et de mods. Et comme il ne cesse de s'agrandir, on pourrait presque tenir avec une salle de test par jour pendant 10 ans au moins :)

Bref, ce jeu a fait l'effet d'une bombe atomique dans ma tête. Et j'espère une chose, c'est qu'il fera de même avec vous :D
急性子和路痴就别玩儿了，比如我

Bulmaca tarzı zaten en iyi. Genel olarak baktığımda da oynadığım en etkileyici ilk 10 oyuna giren bir oyun.
Valve kalitesine söyleyecek birşey yok zaten.
Direkt Portal 2'den başlayanlar genelde oyunun çok uzun olduğunu söylüyorlar ama benim gibi Portal'dan beri 2 yi bekleyenler için harika bir süresi var. (10saat)
/
+Hikayesini araştırdığımda gerçekten çok etkiledi Doug Rattmann'ın hikayesi eğer teoriler doğruysa tam bir efkar.
+Oyunun ana hikayesi ise oyunun yarısından sonra ciddi anlamda başlıyor hiç beklemediğiniz olaylar gerçekleşiyor ve bana sorarsanız harika birde Final yapmışlar.
+Müzikler,grafikler,bölüm tasarımı,atmosfer hepsi şahane.
+Eksi bir yön düşünüyorum ama aklıma cidden gelmiyor aslında bakarsak diyaloglar bazı yerlerde çok fazla ve hızlı (özellikle Cave Johnson'un konuştuğu bölümlerde oyuna geçmek için 5dk bekledim) ama bu bir eksimi bence değil
Bence 10/10'luk bir oyun Atölye desetği olmasıda çok güzel bir özelliği sıkıldıkca gir oyuna test yap.
Almak isteyenler kesinlikle kaçırmasın bunu ama tavsiyem Portalı oynayıp geçin ve internetten genel hikayeye şöyle bir bakın derim.

This game is very fun!!
Good graphics, good sound quality and it suprisingly doesn't lag at all on my potatoe laptop which makes me very happy :D
That robot lady that talks to you from time to time while doing the missions just makes me laugh everytime time!!
overall I rate this game a good old 9.99999999999999999/10
Highly recommended!!

刚开始玩时确实有点懵，这是干嘛呢？但玩着玩着觉得：哇,这个游戏真的好好玩！！
很多地方需要仔细思考，才能通过。夏促看到好友有在玩就随手加入购物车，现在想想，
真他喵的机智~！！为制作者点赞！

Even though I didn't put many hours in the game (yet), I enjoy it alot.

The singleplayer mode (took me around 12-14 hours to finish) is awesome.

Then there's the workshop. There are tons, literally tons of test chambers made by the community to check out. It surprises me how good some people are at making them. I'm pretty sure I'll put more and more time in this game.
